研究发现，多吃类黄酮可能会减慢衰老并增强脑部健康。大量富含类黄酮的食物，例如茶，苹果，蓝莓和红酒，与老年人，尤其是女性的脆弱风险，精神健康不良和身体障碍的风险降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/eating-more-flavonoids-may-slow-agging-gation-ang--boost-boost-boost-broain-health-health-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/eating-more-flavonoids-may-slow-ang-slow-agging-ang--boost-boost-boost-broain-health-health-tudy-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=567c0eef-5A01-4840-97FF-2C23DB3FF08B Thu, 20 Feb 2025 19:41:00 -0500 Eating more flavonoids may slow aging and boost brain health, study finds
橄榄油可防止体重增加，而黄油和人造黄油则添加磅，研究发现一项对121,119名参与者的长期研究发现，随着时间的流逝，橄榄油摄入量的增加与体重增加较小有关，而摄入人造黄油，黄油和植物油会导致体重增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/olive-oil-oil-prevents-weight-gain-while-while-butter-and-butter-and-margarine-add-cound-counds-counds-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/olive-oil-prevents-weight-weight-gain-while-butter-and-butter-and-margarine-add-und-pound--------------------------comments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=961b4fce-2d23-4954-AB5F-B78B1574B104 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 19:01:00 -0500 Olive oil prevents weight gain while butter and margarine add pounds, study finds
辣椒可以改善多动症症状吗？科学家探索他们的肠道连接辣椒可能通过调节肠道微生物组，辣椒素，维生素C和omega-3脂肪酸来影响多动症症状，从而显示对神经递质和炎症的潜在影响。但是，需要进行临床试验来确认其功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/can-chili-peppers-peppers-improve-adhd-symptoms-scientists-scientists-scientist-scientist-their-glore-their-gut-brain-connection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/can-chili-peppers-peppers-improve-adhd-symptoms-scientists-scientist-scientist-scientist--their-gut-brain-brain-connection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34e2bbe8-Ed00-44ee-98Da-3Eba3eba3d751f45 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 18:36:00 -0500 Can chili peppers improve ADHD symptoms? Scientists explore their gut-brain connection
每天鳄梨无法解决心脏健康，但它可以提高饮食和睡眠一项随机对照试验发现，每天26周的鳄梨消耗并不能显着改善整体心血管健康（LE8评分），但确实提高了饮食质量，睡眠健康和血脂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/an-avocado-a-day-wone28099t-fix-fix-health-health-health-health-t-it-it-it-it-boosts-diet-diet-and-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/an-avocado-a-day-wone28099t-fix-fix-health-health-health-health-thealth-it-it-boost-boosts-diet-diet-and-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=19d29c5e-17f9-4df9-4df9-9316-E8063EF3F064 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 18:09:00 -0500 An avocado a day won’t fix heart health, but it boosts diet and sleep
KFF健康新闻“什么健康？”：十字准线中的医疗补助疑问，国会制定了一项预算计划，而唐纳德·特朗普总统都承诺支持该计划以及保护该计划，因此，对于低收入人士的医疗补助健康保险计划的未来是有疑问的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-medicaid-in-the-crosshairs-maybe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/kff-health-news-whath-what-the-health-medicaid-in-the-crosshairshairs-maybe.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A62C0E10-F093-4DD1-8EA2-422C84E67460 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 14:11:43 -0500 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': Medicaid in the crosshairs, maybe
FDA提供了安全婴儿配方处理的基本技巧食品药品监督管理局（FDA）负责婴儿配方的制造商，并有助于确保这些产品安全并支持食用它们的婴儿的健康增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/fda-provides-esential-tips-for-safe-safe-infant-formula andling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/fda-provides-sential-tips-for-safe-safe-infant-formula andling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faa7dd54-665f-4194-BB87-5F9CA2CD9E67 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 14:07:53 -0500 FDA provides essential tips for safe infant formula handling
新方法显示了治疗脆弱X综合征的承诺在研究和记忆研究所的麻省理工学院神经科学家的一项研究基础上，研究和记忆研究所报告了一种新的方法来治疗脆弱X综合征的病理学和症状，这是最常见的遗传引起的自闭症谱系障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/new-apphack-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-fragile-x-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/new-apphack-shows-promise-promise-formise-foreating-fragile-x-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6360b02b-1ac9-4252-8851-069f3514a808 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 14:02:34 -0500 New approach shows promise for treating fragile X syndrome
突破性发现揭示了丙型肝炎的潜在治疗为了回答数十年来的生物学问题，关于肝炎病毒（HBV）如何能够建立肝细胞感染，这是由纪念斯隆·克特林癌中心（MSK）（MSK），Weill Cornell Medicine，Weill Cornell Medicine和Rockefeller University领导的研究确定的。脆弱性为新疗法打开了大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/breakthrough-discovery-unveils-potential-wareatment-foreatment-for-hepatitis-b.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/breakthrough-discovery-unveils-potential-wareatment-foreatment-for-hepatitis-b.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=057b71a5-c9bd-4eed-4eed-a732-ef70ec7b671f Thu, 20 Feb 2025 13:54:07 -0500 Breakthrough discovery unveils potential treatment for hepatitis B
FDA通过五层保障措施确保血液安全每天，美国各地的医院输血或血液组成部分（例如血小板），以挽救车祸中的人们的生命，以及火灾和其他紧急情况的受害者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/fda-ensures-blood-safety-safety-through-five-five-layers-safety.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/fda-ensures-blood-safety-safety-through-five-five-layers-safety.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f21665A8-D3D4-49B6-868E-FB99D7844C Thu, 20 Feb 2025 13:40:00 -0500 FDA ensures blood safety through five layers of safeguards
科学家发现了先天性心脏病的隐藏遗传原因西奈山伊坎医学院的科学家和合作者已经确定了可能导致先天性心脏病（CHD）的新型遗传相互作用，这是一种常见的先天缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/scientists-uncover-hidden-gentic-genetic-causes-fos-gongenital-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250220/scientists-uncover-hidded-gendent-genetic-causes-gongenital-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71fd53A0-F781-4198-B51E-87CA108A9741 Thu, 20 Feb 2025 13:36:37 -0500 Scientists uncover hidden genetic causes of congenital heart disease
